Package com.my.app.face_catch.drawing_utils

Interface DrawingUtils

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleUtil, LineUtil, RectangleUtil
public interface DrawingUtils
interface for basic drawings based on opencv
Since:
2020-11-4
Version:
1.0
Author:
Balagurovskiy

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static double FONT_SCALE
    Scale that multiplies font size
    static int FONT_THICKNESS
    Thickness of letters

    • drawText

      default void drawText​(org.opencv.core.Mat src, org.opencv.core.Point startPoint, org.opencv.core.Scalar color, java.lang.String text)
      draw text util based on opencv
      Parameters:
      src - - base matrix where text will be placed
      startPoint - - left corner point (start point)
      color - - rgb color for text
      text - - actual text that will be drawn

    • drawTextWhite

      default void drawTextWhite​(org.opencv.core.Mat src, org.opencv.core.Point startPoint, java.lang.String text)
      draw text util based on opencv ( white text color by default)
      Parameters:
      src - - base matrix where text will be placed
      startPoint - - left corner point (start point)
      text - - actual text that will be drawn

    • drawTextBlack

      default void drawTextBlack​(org.opencv.core.Mat src, org.opencv.core.Point startPoint, java.lang.String text)
      draw text util based on opencv ( black text color by default)
      Parameters:
      src - - base matrix where text will be placed
      startPoint - - left corner point (start point)
      text - - actual text that will be drawn
